itemDisplayName: Create a POC environment for GHD
description: This template creates 11 new Azure VMs, each group load balancer and a VNet. It configures a primary and backup AD Domain Controller for a new Forest and Domain, two file servers using DFSR, two SQL Servers and witness in AlwaysOn configuration and 4 Sharepoint VMs with a Sharepoint farm and site
summary: This template creates POC environment for GHD
